review: This thing exceeded my expectations. I dislike that I cannot use it to watch The Game of Thrones but that is entirely a HBO issue. The stick works extremely well. It is user friendly. Thank you Amazon. Well done. I would recommend this item to anyone.
author: Mikel Thompson

review: Works well much better than Rok, this one is simple one time setup with tiny remote and great Pic, not quiteHD but close. Failed to start one time, unplugged power for 15 seconds took off again., Runs cooler than thefirst one other brand, it was hot to touch.Cons: Pic quality not quite as expected but ok.The center ring on control is a little hard to make contact.
author: Richard Harris

review: New in original packaging & works to my expectations
